# =========================================
# Unity .gitignore
# =========================================

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/
MemoryCaptures/
Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Visual Studio / Rider / VS Code
.vs/
.idea/
.vscode/
*.code-workspace
*.sln
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.tmp
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Unity cache and auto-generated files
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.pidb.meta

# Unity Addressables
/[Aa]ssets/[Aa]ddressable[Aa]ssets[Dd]ata/*/*.bin*
/[Aa]ssets/[Aa]ddressable[Aa]ssets[Dd]ata/*/*.hash

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.ipa
*.exe
*.app
*.dll
*.so

# Crash and debug logs
sysinfo.txt
*.stacktrace
*.log

# Autogenerated meta files
*.pidb
*.user
*.booproj

# Packed data
*.unitypackage

# Collaborate / Plastic SCM
. PlasticSCM/
.collabignore

# Rider / VS Code
.vscode/
.idea/
*.code-workspace

# Unity Cloud Build
/[Bb]uildReports/
